header: Some of your details have not been recognised
p1: You have successfully verified your identity with a certified company, but Department for Work and Pensions are unable to match your details. You do not need to verify with another certified company.
p2: To get your State Pension you need to call us to confirm some personal details. You will need your National Insurance number.

overseas.p1: Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm UK time
